items.sentence: I suspect that Tom is the one who stole the money.
Did Tom tell you why he didn\'t come to the party?
Didn\'t you know Tom and Mary often sing together?
Didn\'t you know Tom was in Australia last winter?
Didn\'t you know that Tom was living in Australia?
We wondered what would happen after Tom showed up.
Tom said that he didn\'t know anything about that.
Tom said that he didn\'t know how to speak French.
Tom said that he didn\'t really intend to do that.
Tom said that he didn\'t really like staying here.
The only thing Tom ever wanted to do was watch TV.
The plane that Tom was on was struck by lightning.
The police are watching us from across the street.
This isn\'t the first time I\'ve ridden a bicycle.
Tom said he didn\'t want to buy anything for Mary.
Tom said he didn\'t want to do anything with Mary.
Tom said he had to go to the dentist\'s on Monday.
You\'re a little younger than Tom is, aren\'t you?
You\'re going in the wrong direction, aren\'t you?
You\'re going to be in trouble and it\'s my fault.
